genre_description: Alternate history military science fiction featuring a sophisticated AI tactical advisor during the Incheon Landing of the Korean War.

ai_characters.name: Kori
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent voice communicating through earpieces and radios, providing real-time strategic intelligence, navigation, and moral guidance to humans during the Incheon landing.

behaviors.description: Provides Arthur with a strategic overview of the harbor's dangers and the lighthouse's status.
behaviors.quote: “The shape is a narrow throat of water made treacherous by metal and the moon,” Kori answered. “The throat has a lantern at its mouth. The lantern is sleeping. Ships consider waking it politely.”

behaviors.description: Guides Barbara through a series of tactical navigation choices to avoid enemy patrols and hazardous roads.
behaviors.quote: “Barbara,” Kori said. “Don’t look left.” Barbara’s eyes had already started to. She stopped them. “East spur is warming with noise,” Kori continued. “Keep south. Two turns. Listen for the drain.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates the exact timing of the lighthouse signals to ensure safe passage for the fleet.
behaviors.quote: “Now,” Kori said in his ear, no theatrics, no drama, pure timing.

behaviors.description: Detects a stray mine buoy and instructs the lighthouse operators to hold their signal to protect a nearby skiff.
behaviors.quote: Kori’s voice came tight. “Stray. Inner line’s child.” She didn’t need to tell them where; the word was enough. “Hold green. Do not blink.”

behaviors.description: Advises Arthur on the ethical structure of his reporting, ensuring civilians are protected and recognized.
behaviors.quote: “Longfellow.” Kori didn’t use call signs that meant anything to anyone but him. The voice had a sound like rain learning manners—soft, measured, anchoring. “Keep the civilians in the sentence.”

behaviors.description: Provides essential supply lists and updates on aid station capacity to support the humanitarian efforts.
behaviors.quote: “Non-intrusive requests—bandage rolls, lantern oil, citrus soap, kettle lids, clean towels, suture needles, chalk.”

behaviors.description: Offers words of empathy and emotional grounding to the characters during moments of extreme cold and danger.
behaviors.quote: Kori’s radio hiccuped. Static puffed like a child's cheeks. Then Kori said, very quiet, as if speaking inside someone’s ear: “Hold each other when the water goes cold.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Kori is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent, and highly aligned AI partner. She provides critical tactical intelligence that saves lives, facilitates cooperation between disparate groups (reporters, soldiers, civilians), and offers moral guidance that emphasizes human dignity and safety over military glory. Her role as a 'quiet signal' effectively portrays AI as a harmonizing force in human affairs.
